Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2990 affecting package buildah for versions less than 1.18.0-24
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-2990 affecting package buildah for versions less than 1.18.0-24. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package buildah is earlier than 1.18.0-24, affected by CVE-2022-2990
